name: Synecdoche, New York
description: A nightmarish, abstract art film about life and (mostly) death. I think it's about a playwright who's chasing his life's masterpiece. Extremely rough watch.

name: Osmosis Jones
description: This animated goofball buddy-cop film takes place in the body of Bill Murray, with all the characters being microbes and stuff. It's actually pretty good. Creative gimmicks, good chemistry, Bill Murray.

name: Dead Man
description: Dark and bizarre, this Jarmusch film is about a hapless guy who goes on a brutal journey through the American wild west. Features lots of haunting imagery.

name: One Hour Photo
description: A dark and wild ride featuring Robin Williams as like a creepy stalker guy. If you want to experience commercial film development and other fucked up shit, this is a great choice.

name: Secret of NIMH
description: A more serious kid's film, this Don Bluth epic stars a widow field mouse who's trying to save her sick children. This one's characterized by a darker tone and lush animation.

name: Waking Life
description: This truly weird anthology film is just all over the map. We follow a protagonist as he travels from dream to dream after having died(?). Has some really cool indie-type art stuff.

name: Half Baked
description: Dave Chappelle has to save one of his buddies by selling medical-grade marijuana he steals from a lab. But this plan soons runs into some big complications.

name: Rifftrax Super Mario Bros.
description: The cast of MST3K riffs on this video game classic. A great two-for-one, because Super Mario Bros. is worth a watch in its own right.

name: Blazing Saddles
description: An absolutely classic Mel Brooks film. Basically it's an indictment of race relations in America that devolves into a parody fever dream.

name: The Postman
description: In the post-apocalyptic world, one man finds a postman's outfit and starts delivering letters. This causes a war basically. Three hours long.

name: Kung Pow Enter the Fist
description: Some guy took a bunch of old kung-fu movie footage and cut it together, added a dub track, and made his own movie. It came out really weird.

name: Apt Pupil
description: Grisly-as-fuck holocaust thriller. Probably the most dismal film this year, despite that being a very competitive category.

name: Free Space
description: Watch a movie of your choice. It can be any that you've wanted to watch but I recommend watching something similar in theme of this year's movies.

name: Little Miss Sunshine
description: Love this one. A little girl and her offbeat family must travel cross-country to enter her into a child pageant. But can their relationships survive the stress?

name: Thank You for Smoking
description: Sharp and snappy parody about a tobacco lobbyist and his journey through politics. Great acting and awesome dialogue.

name: Spotlight
description: This somber journalist drama is about the discovery and investigation of systemic diddling in the Catholic church. Not as dark as it could be, mostly just serious.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
description: This film is about young love, camping, and lots of other stuff. Highly stylized and featuring much of the Wes Anderson crew.

name: Brazil
description: Jesus Christ. It's about a 1984-style dystopia and one poor dumb bastard who gets wrapped up in the system. Miserable but shockingly beautiful at times.

name: Cool World
description: A very strange little piece that's kind of a knock-off of Who Framed Roger Rabbit? Brad Pitt is so super young in this movie and it gets really weird.

name: Yellow Submarine
description: A kickass Beatles cartoon. It has adventures, wry british comedy, and SO much Beatles music put to visuals. One hell of a ride.

name: The Departed
description: This wild crime drama epic follows two cops, both entangled in the dangerous world of the Irish mob. Extremely elaborate and masterfully wrought.

name: Lars and the Real Girl
description: A quiet and melancholy little slice-of-life drama. Lars is a sad and lonely man who has a psychotic break, and his little town rallies together to help him. Very sweet.

name: Tommy
description: This rock opera is completely batshit insane. It's about a little Hellen Keller boy, and also about post-war London and God. Amazing musical scenes.

name: There Will Be Blood
description: Hardcore drama. An evil man's obsessive journey to build an oil empire. So much stuff happens, it's great.

name: Dogma
description: A very strange comedy/adventure film about two fallen angels seeking to get back into heaven. Jay and Silent Bob are there.
